extendedInfo.description: Download for in-depth event listings and recommendations by the best critics in the world.FEATURES AND HIGHLIGHTS:-Listings: Browse extensive listings by category (movies, art, night life, music, dance, readings), and see our recommendations.-Filter listings by date and location (see whatâs nearby).-Restaurant reviews from the magazineâs Tables for Two column.-Venue information: Interactive maps show you event and restaurant locations, and we tell you what else is going on there, with comprehensive listings for theatres and galleries.-My New York: New Yorker writers point you toward some of their favorite New York places, from Susan Orlean on the Temple of Dendur to Sasha Frere-Jones on Secret Robot Project.-Audio Tours: Calvin Trillin takes you to his favorite restaurants in and around Chinatown; our art critic, Peter Schjeldahl, escorts you around the Frick Collection; our architecture critic, Paul Goldberger, strolls the High Line with you.-@TNYGOINGSON: Events updates and cultural news from the editors of Goings On About Town, via Twitter.-On the Horizon: Early word of upcoming events youâll want to plan for.-My Favorites: Save event listings and recommendations to your own favorites file.-Share listings and recommendations with your friends via e-mail, Facebook, Twitter, and Foursquare.ABOUT THE NEW YORKER:The New Yorker offers a signature mix of reporting and commentary on politics, international affairs and the arts, along with fiction, poetry, humor, and cartoons. Founded in 1925, The New Yorker has received more National Magazine Awards than any other magazine.

reviews.title: Cannot move to SD card
reviews.comment: This app is very big, which is surprising considering how little info it presents (sometimes NO listings in a given category - in New York City in the Fall !!) .  With its large size you\'d think it could present many of the listings that appear in the magazine.   The last time I tried to update it said there wasn\'t enough memory to update, though the phone had 58 megs of internal memory free.  PLEASE MAKE THIS MOVEABLE TO SD CARD!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sloppy iPhone knockoff
reviews.comment: Slow, confusing and buggy. Doesn\'t feel native to android.
reviews.author: Mario Ram\303\255rez

reviews.title: Looks lovely but makes no sense
reviews.comment: Why is it I can install this app focused on NY when I live in London and can\'t install the magazine of which I am a subscriber?
reviews.author: Olivier Magere

reviews.title: Where is the mag?
reviews.comment: I am trying to read the magazine on my Nexus as a subscriber but can\'t find the app. This is only for the events in NY. I don\'t live in NY.
reviews.author: Michael Savas Tumer

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: More often than not, does nothing other than display \"downloading ... please be patient\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fairly Useful
reviews.comment: This app does show a lot of old stuff that should be deleted (or maybe \"Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close\" really IS  showing somewhere in mid-August, 2012?).  But it also shows the  current stuff.  Not a substitute for The New Yorker, but useful if you don\'t have the magazine with you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really a beta release
reviews.comment: Works OK but very uneven.  Only 4-5 listings for Chelsea galleries and one closed last August.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Showing the past events. Great app if you want to see what you missed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: listings are months old
reviews.comment: This could be a great app, if the listings were current.  I\'m shown events that are months old, films that are no longer playing, etc.. Too bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goings on
reviews.comment: Should be copy paste every big city
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Magazine app
reviews.comment: Any plans for an app for the magazine?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Polish
reviews.comment: Great potential here.On my wish list:search/filter by cost, drilldown by genre,even subgenre, alerts 4 matches (eg:\"free gypsy punk show in 2 days!\")
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great content
reviews.comment: But downloads a lot of data quickly and doesn\'t use the sd card. Otherwise: great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but problem with audio
reviews.comment: A great app overall, but there\'s one serious flaw. The Audio Tours stop playing when the screen display goes to sleep. C\'mon developers, you can fix that!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer overwhelmed
reviews.comment: The perfect app to keep track of what\'s going on in NYC, all in one place. It\'s great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Just NY
reviews.comment: Hate to state the obvious, but if it had more than NY, it\'d be more useful. I like New Yorker but rarely visit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not updated
reviews.comment: Great potential but 75% of the events are 1 - 2 weeks old.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Superb app man.

reviews.comment: Awesome app for new yorkers!!
